divs: Sighting Details1.In my bedroom and had just finished watching a TV show at 10302.Glowing outside my window.3.Something I had never seen.4.I stood there staring at it until it let a yellow beam come out the tip andook off5.It hovered 3 feet above my yard for almost 5 minutes and then it let a yellowbeam come out the top of the teardrop. The beam went around and over my houseebut not back to the UFO. Then the UFO shot straight up into the trees and ididnt see it again.6.When it shot up into the trees. the strange thing was, the treetops partedbefore it touched them.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clive
There were no other sightings in Clive on or around July 5th 2003
